Package mdfs.namenode.repositories

Class Summary
DataNodeInfoRepository Stores Information about available DataNodes As this is a shared recorese it is a Singelton and synchronized by ReentrantLock The lock works in the manner that if the thread holing the lock would crach, the lock will still be released
DataNodeInfoRepositoryNode A node that hold data regarding a DataNode
MetaDataRepository A implementation of MetaDataRepository that is synchronized via ReentrantLock for allowing multiple threads.
MetaDataRepositoryNode The node that contains all the meta-data and information neaded for a file or a dir in MDFS
UserDataRepository UserDataRepository stores MDFS user data that correlates to the files, authentication and so on.
UserDataRepositoryNode A node that holds user data
 

Enum Summary
DataTypeEnum A enum that represtents the type of data, a file or a dir
